name: Sharcc's Aim Trainer
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

Just a simple game where you aim at circles and click them to stay alive!

Features:

  • Three Difficulties!
  • Exciting Music. 
  • A "Seconds Alive" counter.
  •  Custom game mode. 

This is just something I threw together as my first project in unity. Made with my shitty programming skills, so please don't think of this as an actual game. 

Post your high scores in the comments.

Music made with Chrome Music Lab and Soundtrap.com

May be inspired by osu! 

Not guaranteed to actually improve your aim.

https://osu.ppy.sh/users/12712327
